name: Sliced and Diced
description:
You play as a knight with a random weapon fighting his way through a dungeon full of bosses.  After you defeat a boss you be given a chance to reroll the dice to get a new weapon at the cost of your health. Try to defeat the bosses and get the highest score possible!

Controls:

W, A, S, D: Movement

Right Click: Shoot

Made for 2022 GMTK Game Jam
